description: '''Mizrahi music''' ({{langx|he|מוזיקה מזרחית}} ''{{transliteration|he|muzika mizrachit}}''  {{IPA|he|ˈmuzika mizraˈχit}}, "Eastern music/Oriental music") refers to a music genre in [[Israel]] that combines elements from the [[Middle East]], [[North Africa]], and [[Europe]]; and is mostly performed by Israelis of [[Mizrahi Jewish]] descent.{{sfn|Horowitz|1999|pp=452-453}} It is usually sung in [[Modern Hebrew]], or literary [[Hebrew]].{{sfn|Horowitz|1999|p=453}}
